oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1960-10-22 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from October 22, 1960. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), George Morgan (host/performer), guest performers the Willis Brothers, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Archie Campbell, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1098th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Archie Campbell; Faron Young; Willis Brothers; Del Wood; George Morgan
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: George Morgan introduces Archie Campbell -- Comedy routine (Archie Campbell, George Morgan) -- The Proof Is In The Puffing (Faron Young) (recording) -- George Morgan introduces the Willis Brothers -- Billy The Kid (Willis Brothers) -- George Morgan introduces Del Wood -- Ballin' The Jack (Del Wood) -- George Morgan talks -- It's Best You Know (George Morgan) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (George Morgan) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Network announcements (Grant Turner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Sloan, Ralph; Tennessee Travelers; Jackson, Tommy; Campbell, Archie; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Jordanaires (Musical group); Morgan, George, 1925-1975; Pruett, Sammy; Willis Brothers; Willis, Guy, 1915-1981; Willis, Skeeter, -1976; Willis, Vic, -1995; Young, Faron; Wiggins, Roy
